channel.title: physics.pop-ph updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: physics.pop-ph updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: MO0NFALL: The Great Filter and Exo-Moon Occurrence
item.description: arXiv:2303.18227v2 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: We observe neither life beyond Earth, nor moons around exoplanets, despite the prevalence of Earth-like planets across the galaxy. We suggest Moonfall as a possible mechanism to explain both simultaneously.
item.dc:creator: Casey Brinkman, Keyan Gootkin, Rena A. Lee, Grey Murphree, Nick Saunders, Linnea Wolniewicz
